name: SSC_GEN_REC_INFO
description: The SSC_GEN_REC_INFO table contains one row for each patient-level SmartSet Information record in your system. Each row contains general information that is not specific to any contact such as the record's ID, name, and SmartSet Information type.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient-level SmartSet Information record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient-level SmartSet Information record as it appears in Hyperspace.

columns.name: SOURCE_STEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Pathway Step that contains this record.

columns.name: SOURCE_SMARTGRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Pathway SmartGroup that contains this record.

columns.name: APPLY_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the SmartSet Information record was applied to the pathway.
